Player History
Released by Milwaukee on 3/2/1965...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/2/1967 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 9/4/1968 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Released by Texas on 2/13/1970...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1972...
Injured on 5/12/1972 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/20/1973 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1976, off Rich Gossage (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1976, off Billy Farmer (CHC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1976, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1976, hitting .270 with 27 HR, 113 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 4/9/1977...
